meanings.definition: An extra payment or gift given as a reward for good performance.
meanings.sent1: She received a bonus for doing well on her test.
meanings.sent2: The company gave out bonuses to employees for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The bonus made her smile from ear to ear.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a bonus in an otherwise stressful day.
meanings.sent5: The bonus was like a cherry on top of an already delicious cake.

meanings.sent1: The toy came with a bonus sticker inside.
meanings.sent2: As a bonus, the package also included a free sample.
meanings.sent3: Finding money in his pocket was a pleasant bonus.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with a bonus of vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected bonus of seeing a shooting star made her night magical.
